pl.chilldev.commons.jsonrpc.daemon

Class Listener<ContextType extends ContextInterface>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pl.chilldev.commons.jsonrpc.daemon.Listener<ContextType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ContextType - Execution context type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, IoServiceUtils.Configuration

    public class Listener<ContextType extends ContextInterface>
extends Thread
implements IoServiceUtils.Configuration
    Single listener worker.
